content:
mruthaneppol njaan vismruthanaay-haale....
Paazhpaathram po-laayen njaan.

Chonnen nee thaanen dyvam-haale....
Nin kyyil thaan-kaalangal.

satthamane! Karunaapoornnaa!
Vidhiyelkkaruthe ninnatiyaar
thirumumpil jayamaarnnonaar?
Vidhi cheyyalle neeyavare
/tkartthaave!-avare anpaal
/tjeevippikkenam; ninne
njangalithaa vaazhttheetunnu.

maranam praapicchazhukippo-yonaam
laasarine kabaree-nnaahvaanam cheytha
srashtaavinnaajnjaa-dhvani uththaana mahaadivase
mruthare-etticcherkkum
yoshaaphaatthenna-saanusthaanatthil.
Arachanirikkum thronosil.
Sathyavidhikkaayu thalamurakal vannettheetum.
Naathaa! Sarvveshaa! Enmelannaalil
kaarunyam cheyyenam nee-praanapradanallo.

dhanyan mashihaa vaakkaal mruthare uyarppippon
thankalppana paa-licchorkkaayu
thejo-vasthram nalkeetum
/tavane raajyatthethirelpaan
/tavar meghangalileri varum.
Avanaanandattho-taarkkum:
“vanne-ri kykkondituvin,
kalppana kaattho-rkkaayu mumpe-
thaathan karutheetumaa-raajyam.'’

maammodeesaa-neeril ninnum mshee-haa than
rooshmaa ettore mruthare!
Vazhi ni-ngalkkundaashippaan
/tmruthilokatthil dheerathayum
/tprathyaashayathum praapippin
uyirotezhunnelkkum ningal
kete-thum theendeetaathe
kallarayinnum parudeesaa
pookaan vaasaramaa-sannam.

dhanyan paulo-shleehaa chonnevam-ketten:
mruthare ortthi-ttazhal ningal-
kkaruthennaashiccheetunnen.
/tvaanin kaahalanaadatthaal
/tmrutharellaarumezhunnelkkum
thaalkkaalikamaamee-gaathram
nithya-thaye praapiccheetum
thanuvezhunnelkkum ketillaa-
thuththaa-natthin vannaalil.

varshikkatte thaatha-nayicchittaa baabel
theecchoolayil baa-lanmaaril
veezhtthiya jeevappanineeraa
/tmruthilokatthaakulamerum-
/tbhavanangalil maruvunnoril.
Ninnabhayatthil nidritharaam
daasa-nmaar than pizha pokkee-
ttavakaasham nal-keetenam
shaashvatha susthira raajyatthil.

Ithu mruthiyin divasam-vedanayin divasam
paridevana divasam-katudivasam naathaa!
/tnalkanamaa-shvaa-sam.

Sahajan rakshikkaa-snehithanuthakeetaa
evam nibivachanam-kriyayaal niraveri
/tthuna naathaa-che-ke.

Naavukaleennellaam-sthothram kartthaave!
Ninnaal mrutharuyarum-svarggam neteetum
/tsthothram paa-tee-tum.

Ee daasan naathaa! Thirusannidhiyil
cheytha pizha-ykkellaam-kshama nal-kenam.

Ninne e-ttonaam-ee daa-sane nee
ettu para-njitanam-vaagdaa-nam pol.

aadaam nijamakkalkkekiya kaasaa
aa mruthipaaneeyatthinu kayperum.
Paanam cheyvaanaadaami-
nnaathmaja-rathu murayaayu kymaari.

haale...U haale... Preethippetteetaname atiyaanil
erum krupayaalivane rakshikka. Haale…
naamellaavarum duakhatthotum sankatatthotumkoote yogyamaayi ninnukondu dyvatthinu preethikaramaaya shabdatthil kuriyelaayison ennu ettu chollanam.

jeevanteyum maranatthinteyum mel adhikaaramullavanum, maranatthin്reyum viyogatthinteyum utayavanum, aathmaakkaluteyum sarvva jadangaluteyum dyvavumaaya mishihaathampuraane! Ninnotu njangal apekshikkunnu.

“njaan punaruththaanavum jeevanumaakunnu, ennil vishvasikkunna evanum nithyajeevanundu. Avan nyaaya vidhiyil ulppetaathe maranatthil ninnu jeevanilekku maarikkazhinjirikkunnu” ennu aruliccheythavanaaya mashi haathampuraane! Ninnotu njangal apekshikkunnu.

marikkunna evanteyum maranagathi kaalil thutangi thalavare etthunnathinitaykku avan്re manasu anuthaapatthilekku dhruthippettukondirikkanam ennu jnjaanasampoornnamaaya thante manushyaavathaaratthil kalppicchu krameekaricchavanaaya mashihaa thampuraane! Ninnotu njangal apekshikkunnu.

njangalellaavaruteyum aathmaakkale aakelkkarusaa yuteyum synyangaluteyum aadhipathyatthil ninnu svathanthuramaakki rakshicchavanaaya kartthaave! Dushtanmaarute aathmaakkale pitikootuvaanaayi anthareekshatthil pathiyirikkunnavaril ninnu ee njangalute sahodaran.....Te aathmaavine nee rakshicchu svarggeeya oorshlemil etthikkumaaraakaname. Ennu ninnotu njangal apekshikkunnu.

kartthaave! Njangal nin്re randaamatthe varavil nin്re ethirelppinaayi purappetukayum sakala parishuddhanmaarumorumicchu ninneyum ninte pithaavineyum parishuddha roohaayeyum sthuthikkukayum cheyyatthakkavannam santhoshapradamaaya nin്re punaruththaanatthin്re prakaasharashmikalaal njangalellaavaruteyum aathmaakkale prashobhippikkaname. Naam moonnu praavashyam kuriyelaayison ennu ettuchollanam.

vathsalare doora-tthenthinu nilkkunnen
arikil varin, shlomo tharuvin, praarththicchituvin.
Sankata keertthanamen-perkkaayu paatituvin
mruthi paathaalakavaatatthil bandhicchenne.

Maranatthin doothan-pirake vannappol
chuttum paartthen thuna cheyvaan vannillaarum
vili koottunnorkkaay-velivaakum naathaa!
Nin dyvikamaam valabhaage nirtthanamenne.

Vathsalare sathyam bhayamaarnneetunnen
kadtinabhayatthaalennakathaarilakeetunnu.
Jagatheerakshakanaam-mashihaa nrupanen per-
kkaal vittathinaal pokunnen sankatapoorvvam.

bhuvananivaasikale! Shubhamotu vaaneetuvin
lokamayanmaarkkilla gunam kaalam moolam.
Pokunnen nalkaan-en്re kanakkellaam
sarvvarahasyavidheeshan than thirusannidhiyil

vyroopyam sumukhar-kkekum mruthiye nee
snehithanotu modippone khedippikkum.
Vannini nin bharanam-neekki duakhithare
svaprabhayaal modippikkum naathan dhanyan.

Paazhoozhiyiluyarum-shooshaanappookkal
vasthram kyppaniyallaatthathu chaarttheetum pol
aadaam makkalkkaay-roohkkudishaa neythu
vasthramuyirppil chaarttheetum punyaathmaakkal.

Sthuthyan-maartthaa mariyaam than-sodaranaa-kum
lovo-sar cheenjennaalum-jeevan-kalpicchon,
nee chennappol yaayeero-sthutha jeevi-cchaal
mrutharanthuyatthil jeevikkum-ninnaa-hvaanatthaal.

mruthasa-nkethe manmayanaa-maadaamo-taayu
niyamam-thalliya-manmayane-khedi-kkendaa nee;
mruthiyum-jeevanumekeetum-dyvasuthan-njaa-
nenno-thiya bahubalavaanaam-svarggeeyan sthuthyan.

chaathuryatthotu bhuvanatthe marananuka-tthil
bandhi-cchoru vijnjan srashtaa-vunna-tharaaymevum
nrupare-padavikalil ninnum bheekararaa-kum
vidhika-rtthaakkale bharanatthil-ninnum-neekkunnu.

Thruppaa-vana thanuvotuyirin-rudhiravume-ttoru
vishvaasikal mrutharettitumee dhoopa-tthaal punyam.
Jeeva-pradanaam mashihaa nin-dyvikamaam vala-
bhaaga-tthavar nilakondange-sthuthi-paa-teetatte.
pethgomo:- avan ennotu paranjappol njaan santhoshicchu.

Kartthaavu varum-mruthare uyirppikkum
sharanam nalkum-sakala paretharkkum.

Kozhayathena-dushtane shishtaneyum
kondiha pokum-mruthi vacchon dhanyan

oru nimisham ko-ndutayone! Mruthare
jeevippikkum-nin varavathigooddam.

ennenneykkum-shlomo nalkituvin
orkkin priyare! Enne praarththanayil

mruthiye! Kashtam-saatthaane! Kashtam
ningate bharanam-mishihaa maayikkum.

Nammute raksha-ykkezhunnalliya naathan
nammute jeeva-nnezhunnallum noonam.

Nin sleebaaye-nampiyathaamaathmam
nin varavinkal nin krupa kaanenam.

Naathaa! Vidhiyil-nee krupa cheythituvaan
ninne namikku-nnaathma shareerangal.

Krupa cheyyaname-nin krupayaalennil
njaan kaananame-nin krupa nin varavil.
